This is all hypothetical but if you beleive that jesus turned water into wine, Then if god actually sent you this wine six hours after it was water without telling anyone but you would you be suprised if no scientist would agree that the wine was water 6 hours ago? Why should people care if a scientist disagrees with genesis? Why is the defence that the earth appears billions of years old under some circumstances even though it is not because miracles can mislead someone thinking only about what they can observe?

post_info.post_title: Science makes error studying  the  water jesus turned into wine.

God not only turned the water into wine, he also left contradictory evidence behind, such as a higher vinegar content which coincided with older wine, along with wine sediments at the bottom to make it appear the wine had been wine for some time.
 
 He did this so that you exercize your free will to believe (?), and also because he hates people who use their brains.
